document_data.name: Adder Swamp
document_data.mainbody: The '''Adder Swamp''', sometimes spelled '''Adderswamp''', was a dangerous expanse of [[lycanthrope]]-infested marshland that surrounded the [[Adder River]] delta in [[Chessenta]].
document_data.Description: The swamp was murky and infested with insects and vermin.{{Cite dungeon/178/Backdrop: Chessenta|72}}
document_data.History: Following the [[Spellplague]] and the various catastrophes that befell Chessenta, the Adder Swamp greatly expanded to cover much of the western coast of the [[Bay of Chessenta]].
document_data.Environment: Like the Adder River, the Adder Swamp was also known for its large snake population. It was also one of the few rare places along the entire coast of Chessenta where sailors would not moor their boats.<ref>
